short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tries to copy the current page DOM elements to the clipboard, including dynamic JavaScript generated elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tries to copy the current page DOM elements to the clipboard, including dynamic JavaScript generated elements. An <iframes> found will be converted to <div> elements with the class "original_iframe" as long as they are from the same domain.
